entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Certain intermixes of braceless and braced usings seems to result in unbalanced try/finally sequence points #61119
    17.3
  • Use Site Diagnostics are missed in tuple symbols in VB #61112
  • Infer indentation for documents that are not open #61109

Closed

  • CS0539 implementing interface method with T? explicitly #61116
  • Description of code fix for "unnecessary assignment" is misleading when the variable is removed #40002
    Backlog
  • Differences detected in solution checksum in integration tests #57324
    17.3
  • Provide a way to efficiently get the list of global aliases in a compilation. #59088
    Backlog
  • Factor out SCI/SRM insertions #39551
  • investigate failing OptProf Tests #33180
    Backlog
  • Improve and automate optprof data collection for Roslyn assemblies #21850
    Backlog
  • Jitting in InlineRenameSession.ApplyReplacements and InitializeOpenBuffers #19704
    Backlog
  • InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program. #61055
  • Unskip CSharpQuickInfo tests when integration machines are updated #53979
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61117
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix F# smart indentation #61115
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Use auto-properties for PropertyOverrides #61107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Inline the Inheritance Margin template selector #61106
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part1). #60036
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61118
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Backport build yml and publishing script changes #61043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Tools|Options code ordering to match waht is in the UI #61110
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify initialization logic #61100
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use correct directory for loghub logs #61104
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move usings on paste off the UI thread #61092
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create shared helper to handle finding extensions in analyzer references #61108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable semantic token LSP integration tests + re-enable quick info tests #61098
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Simplify common CWT pattern #61099
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61103
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
